body: So out of all the things that could possibly happen, my computer broke. .-. As soon as I get a new one, I'll connect. Until then, I'll have to use just the forums or connect with Minechat on my tablet. ;_;

title: Break from the server

replies.body: Hope you are able to come back soon.
